name: Vibrant Obituary
description:
Scrap newspaper, speckled with bright, eye-catching paint.It seems tragedy is a daily thing.
Increases the Killer Instinct duration of Dire Crows by +1.5 seconds.

name: Toy Sword
description:
A minuscule toy sword, only a few inches long.Holding it brought out a violent enthusiasm in Victor.
Reduces the Charge time of a Pounce by -0.2 seconds.

name: Rope Necklet
description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Setting speed by +15 %.

name: Thick Tar
description:
Sticky, viscous sludge that Carmina used for an experimental piece.Once it sticks to skin, it is nearly impossible to get off.
Increases the time required by Survivors to Repel a Dire Crow Swarm by +0.5 seconds.

name: Oil Paints
description:
There is little left but a few globs of black and grey, yet Carmina could paint an expansive landscape with them.
Increases the Killer Instinct Detection radius of Dire Crows by +1.5 metres.

name: Choclo Corn
description:
A type of corn common in South America.A few kernels are reason enough for a crow to stop for a snack.
Increases the Idle time of Dire Crows before they disintegrate by +2 seconds.

name: Velvet Fabric
description:
A striking red fabric Carmina used on an art project.Its brightness contrasted against black feathers.
When a Survivor attempts to Repel a Dire Crow Swarm, the Swarm's Aura remains visible for another 1.5 seconds.

name: Untitled Agony
description:
A canvas that was targeted with swipes and trashes of black paint following Matias' death.It radiates with heavy, crippling sorrow.
Survivors swarmed by Dire Crows suffer from the Hindered Status Effect for 1.5 seconds.

name: Still Life Crow
description:
An ink drawing of a dead crow.Carmina's sadness over its death can be felt with each dark line.
Increases the Idle time of Dire Crows before they disintegrate by +4 seconds.

name: Festering Carrion
description:
A stomach-churning pile of meat and guts, yet it attracts hungry crows craving a bite.
Reduces the Cool-down time of Birds of Torment after a Dire Crow takes flight by -0.5 seconds.

name: Automatic Drawing
description:
An experimental drawing Carmina made without conscious planning.Do not think — act.
Reduces the Cool-down time of Birds of Torment after a Dire Crow disintegrates from inactivity by -1.5 seconds.

name: Tiny Fingernail
description:
Charlotte had many ways to mourn Victor's death.As the fingernails loosened from his rotting hands, she took one in remembrance.
Reduces the Unbinding time of Victor by -0.5 seconds.

name: Soured Milk
description:
A metal bottle filled with milk that has since soured.Loud as Victor could be, he quieted down when presented with his meal.
Increases the Shriek radius of Victor by +2 metres.

name: Cat Figurine
description:
A wooden figure that had caught young Victor's eye.He shrieked until his mother stole it from the market, nearly blowing their cover.
Displays the Target location of Victor's Pounce.

name: Madeleine's Glove
description:
A glove once owned by The Twins' mother.During desperate times, it was held over Victor's mouth to keep him from making a peep.
Increases the Shriek radius of Victor by +4 metres.

name: Ceremonial Candelabrum
description:
The candelabrum that Victor tipped over, causing his captors to burn.A symbol of his tenacity.
Increases the Crushing time of Victor while he is idle by +0.2 seconds.

name: Cat's Eye
description:
An eyeball that belonged to a cat eaten by the starving Deshayes family.Victor hid it from his mother, using it as a toy.
Fully charging and holding a Pounce allows Victor to roam silently.

name: Bloody Black Hood
description:
A hood from one of the men that hunted Charlotte.Soon, he became the prey.
Reduces the Cool-down time when switching to Charlotte by -0.5 seconds.

name: Powdered Eggshell
description:
Minuscule eggshell fragments shimmering with a pale golden hue.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Tripped duration by +25 %.

name: Dead Fly Mud
description:
A small lump of mud, black with the remains of flies.Devoured to increase stamina.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Teleportation range by +20 %.

name: Bog Water
description:
Murky water contained in a glass pill bottle from another time.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Trigger range by +10 %.

name: Pussy Willow Catkins
description:
A handful of small, pristine flower clusters covered in a fine greyish fur.
The Auras of Survivors tripping a Phantasm Trap are revealed to The Hag for 3 seconds.

name: Half Eggshell
description:
One half of a perfectly round hollow eggshell.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Tripped duration by +30 %.

name: Dragonfly Wings
description:
A handful of yellowish wings, dry and crisp.Devoured to increase stamina.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Teleportation range by +25 %.

name: VHS Porn
description:
An all time classic.You will not see things quite the same again.
Afterpiece Tonic Gas Clouds are yellow.
Afterpiece Antidote Gas Clouds are purple.

name: Steel Toe Boots
description:
Boots with a reinforced toe that offer protection from impact.
Reduces the Cool-down time after hitting an obstacle during a Chainsaw Sprint by -12 %.

name: Placebo Tablet
description:
A pill that's utterly ineffective... or is it?
Grants 100 % Bonus Bloodpoints for Rush Score Events in the Deviousness Category.
Decreases Rush Movement speed by -15 %.

name: Trapper Gloves
description:
Protective padded leather gloves.
Increases the Bear Trap Setting speed by +30 %.

name: Thorny Nest
description:
A nest that remained empty near Carmina's home.There are sharp thorns embedded in it.
Survivors damaged by Dire Crows suffer from the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects.

name: Silver Bell
description:
A shiny trinket that a crow took a liking to.The clinking of the bell was a distraction to everyone but Carmina.
Survivors swarmed by Dire Crows suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect.

name: O Grief, O Lover
description:
An abstract ink drawing that Carmina drew before walking to the Death Leap.
Survivors swarmed by Dire Crows suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect.

name: Darkest Ink
description:
An unnatural ink, so wretched and dark that it seems to pull in light around it.
Survivors swarmed by Dire Crows suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.
This effect persists for 15 seconds after Dire Crows are repelled from the Survivor.

name: Charcoal Stick
description:
A stick of charcoal that conceals anything it rubs over.
The Auras of flying Dire Crows are no longer visible.
The Auras of Dire Crows are visible for 0.5 seconds upon being summoned.

name: Severed Tongue
description:
Carmina's tongue, cut from her mouth shortly before her death.The sight instils rage not just in her, but in her crows.
Reduces the Slow-down duration of The Artist when Dire Crows take flight by -0.5 seconds.
"How are you going to tell poems now?" — Hooded Man

name: Severed Hands
description:
Carmina's severed hands, cut from her arms shortly before her death.The sight brings sheer fury to her and her protectors.
Any Survivor within 3 metres of a Survivor, who is being swarmed by Dire Crows, will also be swarmed.
"How are you going to paint now?" — Hooded Man

name: Baby Teeth
description:
Two teeth that Victor lost long ago.They are unusually sharp.
Survivors removing Victor suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 30 seconds.

name: Tacky Earrings
description:
A very cheap piece of jewellery made from plastic. Painted to resemble precious material.
Increases the Movement speed of The Shape while Stalking by +10 %.

name: Smiley Face Pin
description:
A friendly looking, bright yellow button used as a sarcastic statement.
Survivors who perform a Self-Mend from the Deep Wound Status Effect applied by The Legion suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.

name: Cypress Necklet
description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants adorned with crudely attached cypress bark and swamp moss.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Setting speed by +20 %.

name: Bloodied Water
description:
Tainted water contained in a folded water lily leaf.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Trigger range by +20 %.

name: Willow Wreath
description:
Three frail willow branches attached to form a triangular wreath.
The Auras of Survivors tripping a Phantasm Trap are revealed to The Hag for 5 seconds.

name: Swamp Orchid Necklet
description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants adorned with withered orchid petals and leaves.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Setting speed by +25 %.

name: Dried Cicada
description:
A large swamp cicada covered in a fine layer of ash; crispy.Devoured to increase stamina.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Teleportation range by +30 %.

name: Cracked Turtle Egg
description:
A pale orange turtle egg, cracked and emptied of its content.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Tripped duration by +35 %.

name: Robin Feather
description:
A warm orange feather, soft to the touch.
Reduces the Cool-down time between Bottle Throws by -40 %.

name: Party Bottle
description:
Be the life of the party!
Hitting a Survivor directly with a Party Bottle interrupts actions as usual, and awards 100 bonus Bloodpoints.
Party Bottles emit confetti when they break, in addition to their usual Gas effect.

name: Fingerless Parade Gloves
description:
Part of the standard Clown apparel, the cut fingers allow for dexterous manipulations.
Increases the Throw speed of the Bottle by +25 %.
Decreases the Throw angle of the Bottle by -15 °.

name: Thick Cork Stopper
description:
A sturdy cork fitting the Afterpiece Tonic Bottles marvellously.
Reduces the Reload time by -0.5 seconds.

name: Sticky Soda Bottle
description:
An empty bottle, sticky with dried sugar and blood.
Start the Trial with 1 additional Bottle.
Grants the ability to carry 1 additional Bottle.

name: Yellowed Cloth
description:
A simple scrap of material to tend to blisters and wipe the puss away.
Increases the Flight speed of Hatchets by +10 %.

name: Junkyard Air Filter
description:
A cracked and dusty filter.It still manages to work better than the stock model.
Increases the Overheat limit of the Chainsaw by +20 Charges.

name: Heavy Clutch
description:
A well-made clutch that keeps the chain moving smoothly.
Reduces the Collision Zone width of the Chainsaw by -30 %.

name: Speed Limiter
description:
A mechanical device that limits the amount of fuel small engines can intake at one time, forcing a constant and safe speed.
Grants 100 % Bonus Bloodpoints for Chainsaw Hit Score Events in the Deviousness Category.
Hits with either Bubba's Chainsaw or the Chainsaw do not automatically trigger the Dying State.

name: Dad's Boots
description:
A pair of trusty boots, pulled from the corpse of Max Thompson Senior.
Increases the Turn speed during the Chainsaw Sprint by +28 %.

name: Punctured Muffler
description:
A roughly modified muffler that allows for extra air flow.
Increases the Cooling speed of the Chainsaw by +50 %.

name: Off-Brand Motor Oil
description:
Affordable oil that can be used to lubricate noisy chains.
Reduces the range within which Chainsaw noises can be heard by -30 %.

name: Death Engravings
description:
Engravings found on the Chainsaw body counting the amount of lives it took.Fills the user with determination.
Increases the Movement speed during a Chainsaw Sprint by +15 %.
Reduces the Heat gained from charging the Chainsaw by -14 %.
Increases the Charge time of the Chainsaw by +12 %.

name: Big Buckle
description:
A glorious, shining belt worn by many good ol' country boys.
Reduces the Terror Radius by -8 metres while overheated.

name: Mother's Helpers
description:
A small number of caffeine pills found in Evelyn Thompson's purse.Side effects include nervousness and irritability.
Reduces the Charge time of the Chainsaw by -18 % for 30 seconds after being stunned by a Pallet.
"Doctor, please, more of these!" — Evelyn Thompson

name: Foxglove
description:
A poisonous plant that sparked Talbot's interest in chemistry. It rekindles deeply buried memories.
Reduces Rush Fatigue time by -0.25 seconds.

name: Compound Seven
description:
This early sample failed to achieve desired results, but demonstrated surprising effects regardless.
Automatically face the nearest Survivor within 16 metres after a Slam.

name: Chipped Monocle
description:
A monocle Talbot rarely used despite his eyesight weakening in later years.
Displays the target location of a Slam.

name: Shredded Notes
description:
The remnants of Talbot's notes, they still contain some valuable information within.
Reduces Token Regeneration time by -0.33 seconds per Token.
Decreases available Rush Tokens by 1.

name: Pustula Dust
description:
Dried Pustula Petals ground into a fine dust.
Increases Slam duration by +0.75 seconds.

name: Padded Jaws
description:
These Padded Jaws are meant to restrain, not to wound.
Bear Traps immobilise Survivors without damaging them.
Grants 100 % bonus Bloodpoints for trapping Survivors.

name: Makeshift Wrap
description:
A scratched and worn brace made of thick, cured animal skin.
The Trapper can no longer be caught in his own Bear Traps, they will instead be disarmed when he steps onto them.

name: Bear Oil
description:
Melted animal fat that can lubricate the Bear Trap's squeaky joints.
Setting a Bear Trap is silent.

name: Wax Brick
description:
A block of wax used to lower friction and facilitate movement in mechanical parts.
Increases the Bear Trap Rescue and Escape times by +33 %.

name: Serrated Jaws
description:
These replacement Bear Trap jaws have saw-like blades, causing awful open wounds when they snap.
Survivors injured by a Bear Trap suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until healed.
"Like a predatory beast, it can smell and track blood."

name: Lengthened Jaws
description:
Jaws with long teeth that dig further into the flesh than a conventional Bear Trap.
Survivors who escape from Bear Traps suffer from the Deep Wound Status Effect.

name: Coffee Grounds
description:
An old rusted can containing damp coffee grinds.
Grants a 5 % Haste Status Effect for 5 seconds after setting a Bear Trap.

name: Matias' Baby Shoes
description:
A grieving reminder to Carmina that Matias would be with her, always watching.
The Auras of Survivors within 5 metres of an idle Dire Crow are revealed to you for 3 seconds.
"See you soon, Matias." — Carmina Mora

name: Videotape Copy
description:
A copy of the deadly videotape imprinted upon by Sadako.It dampens the desire for vengeance.
Projection does not inflict Condemned on nearby Survivors.
Grants 100 % Bonus Bloodpoints for Deluge of Fear Score Events.

name: Weighty Rattle
description:
A shoddily carved rattle that Victor cried over until his mother stole it for him.It is entirely too heavy to be trusted to a child.
Survivors removing Victor suffer from the Broken Status Effect for 20 seconds.

name: Stale Biscuit
description:
A hard, unleavened biscuit that Madeleine stole from a town's market.It was not much, but it was better than most meals
Reduces the Cool-down time of Victor Pounce by -0.4 seconds.

name: Sewer Sludge
description:
A disgusting, sticky mixture that covered the Deshayes during an escape attempt through the city sewers.
Increases the Removing time of Victor by +2 seconds.

name: Rusted Needle
description:
A needle Madeleine used to sew up her children's tattered clothes.
Survivors removing Victor suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until healed.

name: Madeleine's Scarf
description:
A cloth Madeleine wore shortly before her death.The Twins kept it as a memento.
Increases the Movement speed of Victor by +0.3 m/s.
"...shall hereby be recorded as a service to the greater good and the extermination of evil." — Inquiry into the death of Madeleine Deshayes

name: Memorial Flower
description:
A partially faded and dried pink larkspur picked up from a gravestone.
Increases the Stalk rate by +11 %.

name: Boyfriend's Memo
description:
A "romantic", if slightly sleazy, note left around to draw the attention of a female lover.
Increases the range of The Shape's Lunge Attack by +50 % (open time: +0.1 seconds) while in Evil Within I.
"The note is signed: D."

name: Scratched Ruler
description:
A wooden ruler deeply scratched with hash marks.
Reduces Power Recovery time by -5 seconds.

name: Mischief List
description:
A list of mischievous missions to accomplish, memento of brighter days.
Extends Feral Frenzy by +2 seconds.

name: Friendship Bracelet
description:
A wide grey and red braided rope bracelet.The inscription "F. J. S. J." can be seen, crudely written in bold black ink.
Extends the Lunge duration of Feral Slashes by +0.3 seconds.

name: Never-Sleep Pills
description:
Highly caffeinated tablets to make you extra sharp for exams or draining activities.
Reduces the base Movement speed of Feral Frenzy to 4.6 m/s.
Increases the duration of Feral Frenzy by +10 seconds.
Grants a stack-able additional +100 Bloodpoints for successful Feral Slashes, up to a maximum of +500 Bloodpoints.

name: Mural Sketch
description:
A rough sketch of The Legion mural torn from a notebook.
Increases the stack-able Movement Speed boost from successful Feral Slashes to +0.3 m/s, up to a maximum of +1.2 m/s.

name: Bloodied Mud
description:
A handful of mud with veins of deep crimson.The bloody layers empower the mud.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Trigger range by +30 %.

name: Scarred Hand
description:
The cut up, severed hand of the cannibal village butcher.The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
Mud Phantasms have collision with Survivors.
Grants 300 % bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category.
Disables The Hag's ability to teleport to tripped Phantasm Traps.
Scarred Hand trumps all other Add-ons.
"..." — The Butcher

name: Rusty Shackles
description:
Shackles once used to hold prisoners and carcasses in the cannibal village cellar.The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
Tripped Phantasm Traps do not spawn a Mud Phantasm.
Tripped Phantasm Traps do not give any indication of having been tripped to Survivors.

name: Grandma's Heart
description:
The cold heart of the cannibal village elder.The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
Triggering a Phantasm Trap causes the following effects for its tripped duration:

Suppresses the Terror Radius of The Hag.
Increases the Fake Terror Radius of the Mud Phantasms to 16 metres.
"Bring me another slice of the girl." — Grandma

name: Starling Feather
description:
A black feather with an emerald gloss, very soft to the touch.
Reduces the Cool-down time between Bottle Throws by -50 %.

name: Solvent Jug
description:
A chemical volatile compound that irritates the respiratory tract, but increases absorption of the Afterpiece Antidote.
Increases the Invigoration duration by +1 second.

name: Kerosene Can
description:
A thin and clear combustible liquid which numbs the mind when inhaled.
Intoxicated Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 30 seconds.

name: Coarse Stone
description:
This stone is too coarse to do any good.A blade damaged by it inflicts awful open wounds.
Increases the volume of Survivors' Grunts of Pain by +50 % until they are healed, if they are hit by Hatchets.

name: Bandaged Haft
description:
First-aid bandages securely rolled and attached to the Hatchet's haft.
Reduces Cool-down duration in-between Hatchet Throws by -10 %.

name: Amanita Toxin
description:
A toxin from the Amanita mushroom, applied to the Hatchet's blade.It numbs the mind.
Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.

name: Weighted Head
description:
An oddly weighted Hatchet head, crafted to deliver a hard blow to its target.It requires a wielder with a strong arm.
Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Incapacitated Status Effect for 10 seconds.

name: Shiny Pin
description:
A copper pin defaced beyond recognition yet polished to a high sheen.Pillaged from a particularly difficult prey.
Increases Movement speed during Wind-up by +5 %.

name: "Philly"
description:
A stolen camera from a victim of Olsen in Philadelphia, where he worked before.The film inside captured his last night in the city.
Reduces the time required to Mark a Survivor by -20 %.
"Gotta love Philly: keeps giving and giving and I do not wanna forget any of it." — The Ghost Face

name: Wool Shirt
description:
A small boy's orange and yellow striped shirt. Identified with a sewn name tag to "Jesse".
Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effects:

Increases the Regression penalty of failed Repairing and Healing Skill Checks by +4 %.

name: Low Kickback Chains
description:
A specialised chain that reduces the likelihood of kickback.
Reduces the Cool-down time after hitting an obstacle during a Chainsaw Sprint by -28 % .

name: Leafy Mash
description:
A wet mash of fragrant leaves that mask a hunter's scent when stalking prey.
Gain the Undetectable Status Effect for 15 seconds after hitting a Survivor with the Chainsaw.

name: Doom Engravings
description:
Engravings found on the Chainsaw body representing the dark beast that lives in the Fog.Fills the user with determination.
Increases the Movement speed during a Chainsaw Sprint by +20 %.
Reduces the Heat gained from charging the Chainsaw by -14 %.
Increases the Charge time of the Chainsaw by +12 %.

name: Black Grease
description:
Thick grease that can be applied beneath the eyes to reduce glare.
Increases the Charge speed of the Chainsaw by +18 % for 30 seconds after being blinded.

name: Tuned Carburettor
description:
Despite being caked in dirt and oil, this carburettor has been well adjusted.
Reduces the Charge time of the Chainsaw by -25 %.
Reduces the base Movement speed of The Hillbilly to 4.4 m/s.

name: Spiked Boots
description:
Boots with strapped-on pieces of metal which burrow into mud for more stability and control with each step.
Increases the Turn speed during the Chainsaw Sprint by +44 %.
Increases the Cool-down time after hitting an obstacle during a Chainsaw Sprint by +28 %.

name: Plague Bile
description:
A sample of The Plague's bile, distilled and treated with a mixture of chemicals.
Increases Rush Turn rate by +10 %.

name: Canker Thorn
description:
A sizeable thorn snipped from a Visceral Canker. It secretes a mild toxin.
Reduces Rush Fatigue time by -0.5 seconds.

name: Blighted Rat
description:
A rat that briefly returned to life when injected with Putrid Serum, becoming aggressive and uncontrollable.
Increases Rush Movement speed by +4 % for each consecutive Rush.

name: Umbra Salts
description:
Regular sea salt that has momentarily passed through the Spirit World, altering its properties in the process.
Increases Rush Turn rate by +15 %.

name: Rose Tonic
description:
A mixture made with dried roses from the exceedingly rare New Moon Bouquet.
Increases Slam duration by +1 second.

name: Compound Twenty-One
description:
A serum that's fatal to humans. It evokes beneficial qualities in those who are... something more.
When initiating a Slam, reveal the Aura of Survivors within 8 metres of the collision location for 3.5 seconds.

name: Blighted Crow
description:
A dead crow that has been grotesquely mutated by Putrid Serum.
Increases Rush Movement speed by +6 % for each consecutive Rush.

name: Adrenaline Vial
description:
A hormone removed from an unwilling subject's adrenal gland. Though it provides a jolt of energy, it can fatigue its user.
Reduces the Token Regeneration time by -1 second per Token.
Increases the maximum Look angle during a Rush by +50 %.
Increases the available Rush Tokens by +2 Tokens.
Increases the Rush Movement speed by +10 %.
Decreases the Rush Turn rate by -0.5 °/s.
"Please, don't do this..."

name: 4-Coil Spring Kit
description:
A replacement kit for Bear Traps which changes the usual dual spring system to four coil springs, adding a great amount of strength to the Bear Trap's hold.
Increases the Bear Trap Disarm time by +33 %.

name: Trapper Bag
description:
A cured leather waist bag.Large and sturdy to transport hunting equipment.
Start with 1 additional Bear Trap.
Increases the Bear Trap Carrying capacity by 1 Bear Trap.

name: Tar Bottle
description:
A black, matte and sticky substance that when applied to Bear Traps, makes them far less noticeable.
Darkens (α255; R36; G36; B36) the Bear Trap.

name: Secondary Coil
description:
A secondary coil keeps the Bear Trap functional in times when the primary coil becomes unusable.
Increases the Bear Trap Disarm time by +50 %.

name: Rusted Jaws
description:
These Bear Trap jaws are covered with crusty and volatile rust spots, making injuries particularly difficult to heal.
Survivors injured by a Bear Trap suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.

name: Fastening Tools
description:
A specialised set of tools used to fasten Bear Traps to ensure their effectiveness.
Increases the Bear Trap Rescue and Escape times by +25 %.
Increases the Bear Trap Setting speed by +50 %.

name: Old Newspaper
description:
It tells of a local woman who predicted a volcanic eruption, evidence used to initially find Sadako.
Increases the invisibility duration after Manifesting by +33 %.

name: Victor's Soldier
description:
A toy soldier Victor clung to when scared.Something about it evoked jealousy in Charlotte.
If a Survivor crushes Victor while he is idle, their Aura is revealed to Charlotte for 6 seconds.
"Kch--kch—k'ull bawd mennn..." — Victor Deshayes

name: Spinning Top
description:
A wooden top shared between The Twins, though Victor wanted it for his own.He learned he could get what he wanted if he clung tightly and screamed.
Pouncing on Survivors causes them to drop any Item they may be carrying.
"Hush... hush... it is yours then." — Charlotte Deshayes

name: Forest Stew
description:
A stew of foraged vegetables mixed with moss and bark to create a false sense of fullness.
Increases the Movement speed of Victor by +0.6 m/s.
"Eat... eat, child. You'll feel better when it's down." — Madeleine Deshayes

name: Blond Hair
description:
A single slightly wavy blond hair.
Increases the duration of Evil Within III by +10 seconds.
Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by +50 % (+2.5 Stalk points).

name: Reflective Fragment
description:
A tiny piece of a highly reflective material most probably from a broken mirror.
The Auras of Survivors, who have been stalked for at least 1 second while in Evil Within II, are revealed for 2 seconds.

name: Jewellery
description:
A large necklace made of beads an inexpensive metals.One of Judith's favourites.
Increases the Movement speed of The Shape while Stalking by +20 %.

name: Hair Brush
description:
A nylon bristle brush used to add body and softness to hair.
Increases the duration of Evil Within III by +20 seconds.
Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by +50 % (+2.5 Stalk points).

name: Julie's Mix Tape
description:
A dark and depressing mix tape made out from mainly power ballads and gloomy melodies.
Refills the Power Gauge when getting stunned by any means in Feral Frenzy.
Unlocks an additional music layer in the Terror Radius and Chase Music of The Legion.
Can be combined with other Mix Tapes to unlock multiple layers.

name: Etched Ruler
description:
A wooden ruler deeply etched with the names of enemies.
Survivors hit with a Feral Slash suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 60 seconds.

name: Sulphuric Acid Vial
description:
An odourless syrupy liquid with high corrosiveness.
Intoxicated Survivors suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.

name: Spirit of Hartshorn
description:
A pungent chemical compound consisting of ammonia.One whiff is enough to jolt even the most sluggish of minds.
Increases the size and spread of Afterpiece Antidote Gas Clouds by +20 %.

name: Smelly Inner Soles
description:
A mouldy inner sole which gives much comfort to tired feet.
Increases Movement speed while Reloading by +66 %.

name: Flask of Bleach
description:
A potent chemical which causes irritation, burns and lung damage.
Increases the Hindered Penalty from Intoxication by an additional 4 %.

name: Bottle of Chloroform
description:
A sweet-smelling organic compound with strong anaesthetic capabilities.
Increases the size and spread of Afterpiece Tonic Gas Clouds by +20 %.

name: Garish Make-Up Kit
description:
Some for the face and some for the Antidote.The unknown compound intensifies the Antidote's effect.
Increases the Invigoration duration by +2 seconds.

name: Oak Haft
description:
A polished haft which allows for a quick and sly manipulation of the deadly tool.
Reduces Cool-down duration in-between Hatchet Throws by -20 %.

name: Manna Grass Braid
description:
A circular decorative braid made from manna grass.This memory of a lost little one fills The Huntress with rage and focus.
Reduces Wind-up time by -8 %.

name: Leather Loop
description:
This leather strip tied into a loop can be attached to a belt to allow easy transportation of tools.
Start the Trial with 1 additional Hatchet.
Grants the ability to carry 1 additional Hatchet.

name: Venomous Concoction
description:
A toxic concoction, applied to the Hatchet's blade.The murky concoction is mainly composed of Berus Snake venom, which gives it fatiguing capabilities.
Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 5 seconds.

name: Rusty Head
description:
This Hatchet head is covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that make injuries particularly difficult to heal from.
Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.
Rusty Head does not stack.

name: Rose Root
description:
Dried petals that relieve symptoms of fatigue and overexertion when brewed in a tea.
Increases the Flight speed of Hatchets by +20 %.

name: Walleye's Matchbook
description:
A sheet of matches from Walleyes, a small bar in Northern Roseville.A victim's phone number is scribbled in blue.One of the incriminating pieces of evidence found.
Reduces the Power Recovery time by -6 seconds.

name: Headline Cut-Outs
description:
Cut-outs of articles covering unsolved murder cases from Utah to Pennsylvania.While The Ghost Face just authored some of the headlines, he committed all of the murders.Compiling your success makes you proud and boosts your confidence.
Increases Movement speed while Stalking by +40 %.

name: Cheap Cologne
description:
Dollar store cologne with a pungent scent of rubbing alcohol.Worn by The Ghost Face to make his presence known.Reserved for impromptu visits.
Increases the time Survivors stay Marked by +10 seconds.

name: Telephoto Lens
description:
A manual focus lens to remain undetected while taking pictures from afar.
Whenever a Survivor reveals The Ghost Face, they suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 60 seconds.

name: Cinch Straps
description:
Black straps that keep everything in place while on the prowl.
Night Shroud remains active after missing a Basic Attack.

name: Olsen's Journal
description:
A spiral notebook filled with stained, handwritten entries.The journal details different equipment used to stalk victims.Going through your past methods triggers thrilling memories.
Marked Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect until the Mark expires.

name: Olsen's Address Book
description:
Filled in blunt, blue crabbed writing.All the Roseville murder victims are listed there, along with their phone number and address.
Marked Survivors rushing an action reveal their Aura for 5 seconds.

name: Sheep Block
description:
A white and blue wooden block depicting two woolly Lambs grazing and the letter "S".
Survivors interacting with a Dream Trap suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 30 seconds.

name: Kid's Drawing
description:
An unattributed drawing clearly crafted by a young child.
Gain an extra 200 Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category when a Survivor triggers a Dream Snare.
Reduces the Movement Speed penalty of triggered Dream Snares by -10 %.

name: Garden Rake
description:
A small claw rake, a must have tool for any accomplished gardener.
Replaces Dream Snares with Dream Pallets.
Grants 7 Dream Tokens.

name: Prototype Claws
description:
A home-made tool to facilitate bush trimming.
Replaces Dream Snares with Dream Pallets.
Grants 7 Dream Tokens.
The Auras of Survivors interacting with Dream Pallets are revealed for 4 seconds.

name: Outdoor Rope
description:
Sturdy outdoor rope, handy to tie up anything.
Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effects:

Increases the audible range of Generator-Repair noises by +8 metres.

name: Nancy's Sketch
description:
A crude and bold sketch made with Fusain, signed by Nancy H.
Reduces the Cool-down duration of Dream Projection by -2 % for each Survivor inside the Dream World.

name: Pighouse Gloves
description:
Rancid smelling gloves, soiled with unknown substances.Despite everything wrong with them, they do have thick fabric.
Increases your Action speed when damaging Generators and breaking Pallets or Breakable Walls by +20 % while overheated.
Reduces the Pallet Stun duration by -50 %.
"Ain't no mess can stain a hard-workin' man's soul." — Max Thompson Sr.

name: Vigo's Journal
description:
The journal of a man who claimed to have returned from The Void. The knowledge within has practical applications.
Gain the Undetectable Status Effect while Rushing.
"In a wasteland of forgotten dreams and endless routine, the man with a way out is God." — Talbot Grimes

name: Summoning Stone
description:
Talbot used this stone to carve what he believed was his research into the Opium Den's walls.
Hitting a Survivor with a Lethal Rush will call upon The Entity to block Pallets within a radius of 16 metres of your location for 15 seconds.
"Death is only the beginning."

name: Soul Chemical
description:
A chemical squeezed from the pineal gland of a recently deceased Survivor.
During a Rush, the moment The Blight comes within 16 metres of a Survivor who is repairing or healing, trigger a tremendously difficult Skill Check for that Survivor.
Soul Chemical can activate once per Survivor per Rush.
Soul Chemical does not trigger for a Rush started within 16 metres of the Survivor.
"...suspected to cause atypical alterations in neural rhythmic activity." — Unlabelled Mystery School Text

name: Alchemist's Ring
description:
A ring given to chemists graduating from the London School of Medicine. It's a reminder of unrestrained ambition.
Hitting a Survivor with a Lethal Rush will instantly recharge all Rush Tokens.
"The student is accused of grave-robbing with the intent of unsanctioned scientific testing." — Faculty Reprimand of Talbot Grimes, 1838

name: Trapper Sack
description:
A crude leather sack suitable for foraging.
All Bear Traps are carried at the beginning of the Trial instead of spawning throughout the Trial Grounds.
The Trapper is unable to pick up Bear Traps once placed.

name: Tension Spring
description:
A high tension spring that snaps back into place after being stretched.
Automatically resets the Bear Trap 2 seconds after a Survivor escaped from it.

name: Oily Coil
description:
A clear oil that makes handling the Bear Trap's spring more hazardous.
When resetting a Bear Trap, the Aura of the Survivor who had disarmed it is reveal for 5 seconds.

name: Honing Stone
description:
When used with the Bear Trap, the Honing Stone sharpens its blades.The razor-sharp blades inflict deep wounds aimed at bleeding the victim as fast as possible.
Survivors caught in a Bear Trap, who free themselves, are inflicted with the Dying State.

name: Mother's Mirror
description:
A mirror from Sadako's mother's house.A reminder of what Sadako has lost.
Increases the duration of the intermittent visibility phase after Manifesting by +2 seconds.

name: Cabin Sign
description:
The cabin where both Tomoko and Reiko watched the tape.Carries the memory of those first curses.
Reduces the time it takes for a TV to turn on after Projection by -12 seconds.

name: Yoichi's Fishing Net
description:
The net Yoichi used while fishing with his grandfather.A reminder that death comes to us all.
Reduces the time it takes Survivors to acquire another stack of Condemned by -12 % when holding a VHS Tape.

name: Well Stone
description:
A piece of the well where Sadako was trapped, an image burned into the mind of all those who have watched the tape.
Reduces the time it takes for a TV to turn on after having been turned off by a Survivor by -6 seconds.

name: Sea-Soaked Cloth
description:
The hood worn by the mysterious figure in the tape.Makes those near it unable to trust what they see.
Survivors within 8 metres of a powered TV suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.
This effect lingers for 7 seconds after the TV is turned off.

name: Glass Fragment
description:
A tiny piece of tinted glass, probably from a broken object.It is impossible to determine its origin.
The Auras of Survivors, who have been stalked for at least 1 second while in Evil Within I, are revealed for 3 seconds.

name: Dead Rabbit
description:
A grey rabbit which has been opened from neck to tail.
Reduces The Shape's Terror Radius by -25 % while in Evil Within II.
Increases The Shape's Terror Radius by +25 % while in Evil Within III.

name: Mirror Shard
description:
A large and sharp piece of a broken mirror.
The Auras of Survivors, who have been stalked for at least 1 second while in Evil Within II, are revealed for 5 seconds.

name: Judith's Journal
description:
A journal identified as owned by Judith M. Myers.Most of the pages are defaced with frightening and disturbing drawings.
Increases the Stalk rate on the Obsession by +40 %.

name: Jewellery Box
description:
A barren wooden box in which vanity items were once stored.
Increases the Movement speed of The Shape while Stalking by +30 %.

name: J. Myers Memorial
description:
A glossy page ripped from the 1965 Haddonfield High School yearbook, one dedicated to the memory of Judith Myers.
Increases the Stalk rate by +25 %.

name: Defaced Smiley Pin
description:
A once friendly looking, bright yellow button of a defaced smiley.A signature icon of The Legion.
Survivors who perform a Self-Mend from the Deep Wound Status Effect applied by The Legion suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.

name: The Legion Pin
description:
A handmade button with the face of The Legion.To use exclusively on intimidation dares.
Survivors who perform a Self-Mend from the Deep Wound Status Effect applied by The Legion suffer from the Broken Status Effect for 60 seconds.

name: Susie's Mix Tape
description:
A fast and thrilling mix tape with energising songs with break-neck beats.
Extends the Killer Instinct Detection radius by +20 metres.
Unlocks an additional music layer in the Terror Radius and Chase Music of The Legion.
Can be combined with other Mix Tapes to unlock multiple layers.

name: Stolen Sketch Book
description:
A sketch book with imaginative and evocative, if not slightly bizarre sketches.
From the second Feral Slash onwards, Survivors drop their Items when hit.

name: Stylish Sunglasses
description:
Oval-shaped sunglasses that exude poise and cool.Their colour-tinted lenses add an understated appeal.
Survivors Mending within 24 metres of your location have their Auras revealed to you.

name: Joey's Mix Tape
description:
A mix of bangin' tracks and slammin' beats for chillaxin' when life's a bitch.
Survivors who perform a Self-Mend from the Deep Wound Status Effect applied by The Legion suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until fully healed.
Unlocks an additional music layer in the Terror Radius and Chase Music of The Legion.
Can be combined with other Mix Tapes to unlock multiple layers.

name: Stab Wounds Study
description:
A printed medical article stolen from Ormond's public library, vulgarising a study on lesions and stab wounds.
Survivors who perform a Self-Mend from the Deep Wound Status Effect applied by The Legion have their Aura revealed for 4 seconds.

name: Frank's Mix Tape
description:
Never go on a kill mission without your tunes.A track list of massive distortions and loud percussion that stabs at your eardrums.
Increases the Action speed of damaging Generators by +20 % and breaking Breakable Walls by +30 % during Feral Frenzy.
While performing these interactions, the Power Gauge is paused.
Unlocks an additional music layer in the Terror Radius and Chase Music of The Legion.
Can be combined with other Mix Tapes to unlock multiple layers.

name: Ether 15 Vol%
description:
A highly volatile organic compound, toxic at this concentration.
Increases the Intoxication duration by +1 second.

name: Cigar Box
description:
A grim and incomplete collection of fingers.Fills The Clown with longing and focuses his chemical crafting abilities.
Any Invigorated Player sees the Auras of all other Players within a radius of 16 metres.

name: Flower Babushka
description:
A clean and colourful handkerchief adorned with a flower pattern.This memory of a lost little one fills The Huntress with rage and focus.
Reduces Wind-up time by -12 %.

name: Deerskin Gloves
description:
Cured leather gloves that protect the hands and give a sure grip.
Reduces Reload time at Lockers by -20 %.

name: Wooden Fox
description:
Roughly carved, this fox statuette is no more than a few inches.A reminder that stealth and cunning is as effective as raw power.
Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 30 seconds when Reloading.

name: Infantry Belt
description:
A sturdy utility belt pillaged from a soldier.Its multiple leather loops and holsters are useful to transport tools.
Start the Trial with 2 additional Hatchets.
Grants the ability to carry 2 additional Hatchets.

name: Glowing Concoction
description:
An otherworldly concoction that faintly glows a foreboding light.
Survivors hit by Hatchets have their Aura revealed to you for 5 seconds.

name: Marked Map
description:
The annotated map of Northern Roseville, Florida.Each 'X' represents a victim of The Ghost Face.Mapping out your targets allows you to roam the streets undetected.
Increases Killer Instinct duration when The Ghost Face is revealed by +2 seconds.

name: Olsen's Wallet
description:
Olsen's wallet holds thirty dollars in cash, a video club membership card, and a folded picture of Olsen's first Roseville victim.Carrying incriminating evidence boosts your excitement and resolve.
Breaking a Pallet or Breakable Wall immediately recharges Night Shroud.

name: Leather Knife Sheath
description:
A quiet and flexible sheath to carry your blade.Movement is easier when things are fastened into place.
Increases Crouch Movement speed by +10 %.

name: Lasting Perfume
description:
An overpowering musky fragrance worn by The Ghost Face to announce his presence.Reserved for the victims he planned to write about.
Increases the time hooked Survivors take to reveal The Ghost Face to 3 seconds.

name: Knife Belt Clip
description:
A perfect belt clip to scout carry your blade discreetly.No one knows what you are planning to do tonight.
Reduces the Terror Radius of The Ghost Face by -8 metres while crouching.

name: Chewed Pen
description:
A blue pen with a chewed cap that holds traces of Danny's DNA.Incriminating evidence that was never found.
Increases the time dying Survivors take to reveal The Ghost Face to 3 seconds.

name: Victim's Detailed Routine
description:
A ripped page outlining the weekly routine of Olsen's first victim in Roseville.Compiling your victim's habits allows you to anticipate their movements.
Whenever a Survivor is Marked by The Ghost Face, they suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 5 seconds.
"I have been watching you for a while. I wanted this to be special; the kind of headlines that people do not forget." — The Ghost Face

name: Green Dress
description:
A little girl's green dress with a silky white ribbon.
Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effects:

Increases the Regression penalty of failed Repairing and Healing Skill Checks by +4 %.
The Auras of Survivors failing these Skill Checks are revealed for 3 seconds.

name: Cat Block
description:
A white and purple wooden block depicting a sleeping Cat and the letter "C".
Survivors interacting with a Dream Trap suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect for 60 seconds.

name: Unicorn Block
description:
A white and red wooden block depicting a prancing Unicorn and the letter "U".
Survivors interacting with a Dream Trap suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.

name: Paint Thinner
description:
A tin of a highly volatile and inflammable material.
Replaces Dream Snares with Dream Pallets.
Grants 7 Dream Tokens.
The Auras of Survivors interacting with Dream Pallets are revealed for 6 seconds.

name: Nancy's Masterpiece
description:
A painting of a Character, made by Nancy Holbrook at Badham and kept as a treasure memory.
Reduces the Cool-down duration of Dream Projection by -3 % for each Survivor inside the Dream World.

name: Iridescent Blight Tag
description:
A glass-like laboratory tag, moulded from The Fog itself. Either a gift from The Entity or a cruel jest to tag The Blight as he once did to others.
Upon using all Rush Tokens, your last Lethal Rush will put Survivors into the Dying State.
"Progress requires drastic change." — Talbot Grimes

name: Reiko's Watch
description:
The watch that Reiko left her son Yoichi.A distracting and constant reminder of one's impending doom.
Increases the invisibility duration while Demanifested by +50 %.

name: Clump of Hair
description:
Once beautiful and long, Sadako now hides behind her ragged, matted locks.
Reduces the range at which The Onryō is visible while Demanifested by -6 metres.

name: Well Water
description:
Water from the well where Sadako was left to die.Murky and black, it obscures everything around it.
Increases the duration of the Undetectable Status Effect by +2 seconds when Manifesting by any means.

name: Ring Drawing
description:
A drawing of the view from inside the well, as drawn by a young Yoichi.Helping those cursed by the tape can only bring misfortune.
Condemned Survivors spread their Condemnation to other Survivors, who complete a Healing action on them.

name: Rickety Pinwheel
description:
A pinwheel found in the caves of Izu Oshima.It spins even when there is no wind, disorienting those who see or hear it.
Survivors within 8 metres of a powered TV suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect.
This effect lingers for 7 seconds after the TV is turned off.

name: Mother's Comb
description:
The comb Sadako's mother used in the tape.Sadako's psychic abilities are enhanced when she focuses on it.
Reveals the Aura of any TV being turned off in yellow.

name: Bloody Fingernails
description:
Sadako's bloody fingernails, lost as she tried to claw her way out of the well.Evidence of her single-minded need to kill.
Increases the duration of the Post-Projection Movement Speed boost by +50 %.

name: VCR
description:
The original VCR that played Sadako's tape.It is still warm to the touch.
All TVs play the Projection effects when The Onryō Projects to a TV.

name: Hair Bow
description:
A blue tartan ribbon used to tie hair.
Increases the duration of Evil Within III by +30 seconds.
Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by +50 % (+2.5 Stalk points).

name: Vanity Mirror
description:
A standing portable vanity mirror in perfect condition except for a fine layer of dust and face powder covering it.
Stalking reveals the Auras of all Survivors within 16 metres of your location.
The Shape is unable to progress past Evil Within II.
Each Hit Score Event grants 150 % bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category in addition to the regular Bloodpoints gained in the Brutality Category.

name: Tombstone Piece
description:
A fist-sized granite piece taken from a broken tombstone.
Grants the ability to kill healthy or injured Survivors while in Evil Within III.
Killing a Survivor drains the power of Evil Within III, resetting it to Evil Within II.
Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by +150 % (+7.5 Stalk points).

name: Scratched Mirror
description:
A standing portable vanity mirror which has been violently scratched with a sharp metallic object.
Stalking reveals the Auras of all Survivors within 32 metres of your location.
The Shape is unable to progress past Evil Within I.
Each Hit Score Event grants 200 % bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category in addition to the regular Bloodpoints gained in the Brutality Category.

name: Filthy Blade
description:
This blade is stained with foul spots of blood and grime that make injuries particularly difficult to mend.
Increases Mending time by +4 seconds.

name: BFFs
description:
An unnaturally cold silver necklace split into four, one for each best friend.
Hitting Survivors with chained Feral Slashes grants Tokens.The more Feral Slashes are chained together, the higher the amount of awarded Tokens:

First Feral Slash: grants no Tokens
Second Feral Slash: +2 Tokens
Third Feral Slash: +3 Tokens
Fourth Feral Slash: +4 Tokens
Fifth Feral Slash: +5 Tokens
Once the Exit Gates are powered and only if 15 or more Tokens have been acquired, The Legion benefits from the following effect:

Grants a 4 % Haste Status Effect when not using Feral Frenzy.

name: Iridescent Button
description:
A glass-like button moulded from The Fog that captures The Legion's likeness.The surface is warm and reverberating with The Entity's power.
Feral Vaults immediately break the vaulted Pallet.
"The youth consumed by the iridescent glass magnifies and widens the reach of The Entity."

name: Night Vision Monocular
description:
Night vision lens enabling sharp photos even when shrouded in darkness.Ideal for discreet, impromptu visits late at night.
Whenever a Survivor reveals The Ghost Face, they suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 5 seconds.

name: Drop-Leg Knife Sheath
description:
A sheath allowing for a full motion range:ideal to inflict quick and powerful wounds while moving freely.Stolen from a patrol officer the night Danny left Philadelphia.
Grants a 10 % Haste Status Effect for 5 seconds after Marking a Survivor.
"Gotta get ready like a scout — without the stupid patches. What I get is much better." — The Ghost Face

name: Jump Rope
description:
A long Double-Dutch jump rope, stained with many years of use.
Increases the volume of Survivors' Grunts of Pain by +50 %, if they are the Dream World.

name: Blue Dress
description:
A little girl's pale blue dress with white lace which's front is ruined by large cuts.
Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effects:

Increases the Regression penalty of failed Repairing and Healing Skill Checks by +4 %.
The Auras of Survivors failing these Skill Checks are revealed for 4 seconds.

name: Pill Bottle
description:
An empty pill bottle which once contained a medicine called "Zoneral".
Reduces the Distance range at which awake Survivors see The Nightmare intermittently to 12 to 24 metres.
The Nightmare is invisible to awake Survivors beyond 24 metres and when he is carrying another Survivor.

name: Telephone
description:
After watching the video, victims receive a phone call.They are frozen in fear as they realise they have seven days left to live.
Survivors witnessing a Manifestation from within 7 metres suffer from the Hindered Status Effect for 3 seconds.
"I saw a weird video the other day... after it ended, someone called us. Some kind of prank call." — Tomoko Oishi

name: Tape Editing Deck
description:
The editing deck used by Reiko and Ryuji to analyse and copy the tape.Copying and sharing the tape is the only way to survive the curse.
Each Survivor starts the Trial with a VHS Tape in their possession, and their highlighted TV is the one farthest from their location.
"Frolic in brine, goblins be thine." — Message hidden in Sadako's tape

name: Trick Pouch
description:
A pouch with a number of hidden pockets.Used by aspiring magicians and those with something to hide.
Start with 4 extra Blades.
Increases Blade Carrying capacity by 4.

name: Lead Ring
description:
Found in a refrigerator. It's engraved with a disgusting, bloated face.
Increases the duration Rites of Judgement trails remain in the environment by +10 seconds.

name: Spit Polish Rag
description:
A grimy piece of burlap.Spit and elbow grease was enough to wipe down the Speargun in the heat of a shootout.
Reduces the Cool-down time after missed shots with The Redeemer by -0.25 seconds.

name: Wooden Plank
description:
A wooden plank torn from the stage where Otto Stamper sacrificed a meddling journalist.
Increases the number of Charges added to the Nightfall Meter for hooking a Survivor by +25 %.

name: Swing Chains
description:
Rusty, but sturdy chains used to securely attach a swing seat.
Survivors inside the Dream World suffer from the following effects:

The Footstep noises of Survivors are 50 % louder.

name: Class Photo
description:
A large photograph taken at Badham Preschool showing the cheerful class of '94-95.
Causes every Generator to spew blood while channelling Dream Projection and suppresses the Husk.
The Nightmare is unable to cancel Dream Projection once initiated.

name: "Z" Block
description:
A deeply scratched and burnt wooden block which's only recognisable feature is the letter "Z".
Survivors interacting with a Dream Trap suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect for 90 seconds.
Healthy Survivors will leave Pools of Blood as if they were injured.

name: Red Paint Brush
description:
A large paint brush, wet with crimson paint.
Causes all Survivors to start the Trial inside the Dream World.
Survivors are unable to wake themselves up by failing Skill Checks.

name: Rotten Pumpkin
description:
Pumpkin flesh infected by the rotten soil in Hawkins.
Traversing the Upside Down destroys the Portal entered by The Demogorgon.
Grants 200 bonus Bloodpoints for traversing the Upside Down.

name: Memento Blades
description:
Blood-rusted knives, worn from overuse.Employed during Ji-Woon's early murders, they hold a place of importance in his heart.
Grants 100 % Bonus Bloodpoints for Showstopper Score Events.
Increases each Survivor's Laceration Meter capacity by +1 Charge.

name: Killing Part Chords
description:
A set of chords that Ji-Woon never found a song for.Still, the sound is undeniably catchy.
Slightly increases (+0.04 m/s (this value is applied to the start/end parameters of a speed curve)) Throw State Movement speed by +1 %.

name: Inferno Wires
description:
Burnt wires form the studio fire that killed four of the five NO SPIN members.Their deaths gave rise to The Trickster.
Increases Main Event duration by +25 %.

name: Tequila Moonrock
description:
A drink invented in a modest Changwon bar.Became a favourite of Ji-Woon's.
Increases Main Event duration by +50 %.

name: On Target Single
description:
An underground single produced by Ji-Woon before achieving fame.Only the biggest NO SPIN fans collected this hidden gem.
Increases Laceration Meter Decay delay by +2 seconds.

name: Lucky Blade
description:
The first throwing knife Ji-Woon ever owned.Purchased by his father, he was expected to put on a show for those frequenting the family restaurant.
Increases Main Event duration by +0.2 seconds for each Blade Hit.

name: Ji-Woon's Autograph
description:
A signature from the celebrity known as The Trickster.Sore as his wrist was after hundred of these, it was invigorating to know he was so in demand.
Increases initial Throw rate of Blades by +1 Stack.

name: Dead Butterfly
description:
A butterfly found on a bed at Wood Side Apartments. It's frail and nearly falls apart when touched.
Reduces Rites of Judgement Recharge time by -2 seconds.

name: Copper Ring
description:
Found in the basement of Brookhaven Hospital. It's engraved with a picture of a spider.
Increases Rites of Judgement Power duration by +1 second.
"I was locked up inside the basement's basement. It was so small and dark, and I was so afraid. I dropped my precious ring. But I'll never ever go back there."

name: Black Strap
description:
A nylon strap that was used to restrain a victim to a metal frame. The colour makes it difficult to see the blood-soaked into it.
Increases Punishment of the Damned Attack range by +0.5 metres.

name: Wax Doll
description:
A doll carved from wax, handcrafted by a prisoner who would soon face their judgement.
Increases Punishment of the Damned Attack range by +1 metre.

name: Spearhead
description:
The sharp, rusted tip of a spear. It's flaked with blood from its last victim.
Increases Rites of Judgement Power duration by 1.5 seconds.

name: Leopard-Print Fabric
description:
A shred of pink, leopard-print fabric. It's difficult to tell what it was used for.
Increases Killer Instinct duration when triggered by Rites of Judgement by +0.5 seconds.
"It doesn't matter who I am. I'm here for you, James." — Maria

name: Snake Oil
description:
A tincture of oils and extracts purchased from a travelling salesman.Purported to cure all that ails you.
Increases the Reeling speed by +5 %.

name: Rickety Chain
description:
Weak steel links first used on Caleb's prototype Speargun.Despite the chain's failings, it holds sentimental value.
Grants 50 % bonus Bloodpoints for Speared Score Events.
Increases the rate at which Survivors break free from The Redeemer by +33 %.

name: Mortar and Pestle
description:
Disconnected from the world and modern medicine, Stamper's followers originally had to make do with the flora local to the island.
The Dredge emerges from the Remnant facing the same direction as a Teleport is activated instead of facing the direction the Remnant was placed in.

name: Follower's Cowl
description:
They believed the cowls proved their enlightenment, but they merely kept them in darkness.
Teleporting back to the Remnant will activate Killer Instinct during Daytime as well.

name: Caffeine Tablets
description:
Stamper's followers were told not to sleep, or they would bring the wrath of Druanee upon them.Towards the end, he brought in drugs from the mainland.
The Auras of locked Lockers are visible to you in yellow while charging The Gloaming or teleporting.

name: Black Heart
description:
A black fermented heart ripped from the chest of a tentacled creature in the Upside Down.
Decreases the Attack cool-down of successful Shred Attacks by -15 %.

name: Rat Liver
description:
A soggy pile of salty, soft liver.
Increases Movement speed while charging Of the Abyss by +3.5 %.

name: Rat Tail
description:
A chewy rat tail for The Demogorgon to consume.
Increases the Opening speed of Portals by +35 %.

name: Sticky Lining
description:
A fetid, viscous layer that covers and expands the inter-dimensional tunnels.
Increases the Killer Instinct's Detection range by +2.5 metres.

name: Viscous Webbing
description:
Wet, elastic webs that broaden the inter-dimensional tunnels.
Increases the Sealing time of Portals by +16 %.

name: Rotten Green Tripe
description:
Rotten tripe that fuels The Demogorgon.
Increases the Traversing speed between Portals by +15 %.

name: Mews' Guts
description:
The tasty guts of an unfortunate victim.
Increases available Portals by +1 Portal.
Decreases the Attack Cool-down of missed Shred Attacks by -11 %.

name: Barb's Glasses
description:
A broken pair of glasses that travelled to the Upside Down.
Decreases the Pallet Break cool-down of Shred by -15 %.

name: Eleven's Soda
description:
A soda can charged with psychic energy.
Shows the Auras of Generators being repaired in yellow while traversing the Upside Down.

name: Caged Heart Shoes
description:
Shoes that Ji-Woon wore during the music video for One Caged Heart.Allows for smooth, graceful movements of the point dance.
Moderately increases (+0.1 m/s (this value is applied to the start/end parameters of a speed curve)) Throw State Movement speed by +2.5 %.

name: Melodious Murder
description:
An audio file of a victim's crisp, clear shriek as a blade opened her up.Ji-Woon incorporated the sound into one of his more popular tracks.
Reduces Reload time at Lockers by -20 %.

name: Waiting For You Watch
description:
A pocket watch worn by Ji-Woon during a live performance of I'll Be Waiting For You. It is a stage prop that does not work and never will.
Increases Main Event duration by +0.3 seconds for each Blade Hit.
"Don't run awayDon't say we're throughNo way to escape thisI'll be waiting for you" — NO SPIN's "Waiting For You"

name: Ripper Brace
description:
A wrist brace worn by Ji-Woon during the filming of his music video Ripper.Though unintentional, the design stabilises the wrist better than many medical braces.
Increases Laceration Meter Decay delay by 3 seconds.

name: Fizz-Spin Soda
description:
A limited edition can of soda promoting NO SPIN.High sugar and caffeine content.
Increases initial Throw rate of Blades by +2 Stacks.

name: Bloody Boa
description:
A boa that Ji-Woon draped around a victim's slashed neck.A number of pockets are concealed within it.
Start with 8 extra Blades.
Increases Blade Carrying capacity by 8.

name: Trick Blades
description:
Specialty blades that are only seen as faulty by those who lack imagination.A young Ji-Woon dazzled spectators with the trick he performed.
Allows Blades to ricochet off the environment twice.

name: Forgotten Videotape
description:
A videotape of two lovers vacationing in Silent Hill. Despite its sentimental value, it was left behind in the Lakeview Hotel.
Reduces Rites of Judgement Recharge time by -3 seconds.

name: Cinderella Music Box
description:
A music box with a figure from the fairy tale Cinderella, found inside a suitcase adorned with stickers from multiple destinations.
Increases the duration Rites of Judgement trails remain in the environment by +15 seconds.

name: Valtiel Sect Photograph
description:
A photograph of two figures in red hoods. Entitled Crimson and White Banquet for the Gods.
Reduces Rites of Judgement Recharge time by -4 seconds.

name: Tablet of the Oppressor
description:
A metal tablet engraved with Aztec figures.
Increases Rites of Judgement Power duration by +2 seconds.

name: Misty Day, Remains of Judgement
description:
A painting of an imposing figure wearing a steel pyramid atop his head. Victims are caged in the background.
Increases Killer Instinct duration when triggered by Rites of Judgement by +1 second.
"It's him..."

name: Mannequin Foot
description:
The smooth grey foot of a mannequin, brutally torn from its leg.
Increases the duration Rites of Judgement trails remain in the environment by +20 seconds.

name: Burning Man Painting
description:
A diagram of the Lakeview Hotel. Red flames are painted over this place of guilt.
Increases Punishment of the Damned Attack range by +1.5 metres.

name: Leather Strip
description:
Leather strips torn from a Cenobite's uniform, allowing for the mutilation of exposed flesh.
Reduces Summons of Pain cool-down by -0.15 seconds.

name: Modified Ammo Belt
description:
An old ammo belt Caleb altered for his specialised weaponry.Still holds the fine red dirt of the Arizona Territory desert.
Reduces the Reload time by -0.25 seconds.

name: Rusted Spike
description:
A railroad spike that Caleb fastened to the front of the Speargun during a moment of morbid curiosity.The dull tip prevents it from cleanly piercing its target.
Survivors hit with The Redeemer suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.

name: Poison Oak Leaves
description:
An ordinary-looking plant, Caleb found out that spears coated in its oil cause unbearable blistering around wound.
Increases Mending time by +1.5 seconds.

name: Malthinker's Skull
description:
Those who brought negativity to the commune would mysteriously disappear from time to time.Their remains were never found... until The Dredge brought them up.
Increases the Nightfall Meter Charge rate for when Survivors are injured by +66 % per second.

name: Haddie's Calendar
description:
She planned to cross out each day until her parents took her to India, but when tragedy struck, she abandoned her calendar.
Reduces the time to exit a Locker by -1 second.

name: Fallen Shingle
description:
After the Ottomarians were subsumed by The Dredge, the mansion fell into disrepair.
Increases the Nightfall Meter Charge rate for using Reign of Darkness by +15 % per second.

name: Burnt Letters
description:
Some followers tried to write letters home.Stamper ensured that nobody would have contact with the outside world.
Increases the number of Charges added to the Nightfall Meter for injuring a Survivor by +25 %.

name: Air Freshener
description:
After her parents were found, this was in the bag of belongings the police returned.Haddie does not know why she keeps it.
Start the Trial with 4 Power Tokens.

name: Thorny Vines
description:
Thick, thorny vines that stretch and reinforce the inter-dimensional tunnels.
Increases the Killer Instinct's Detection range by +1 metre.
Increases the time Survivors require to seal Portals by +11 %.

name: Brass Case Lighter
description:
A lighter used to ignite trouble.
Survivors under the effect of an activated Portal suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.
This effect lingers for 60 seconds.
"Emits a strong electromagnetic field: it must have come into contact with the Upside Down." — Hawkins National Laboratory

name: Violet Waxcap
description:
A dark fleshed mushroom from the Upside Down that allows The Demogorgon to telepathically distort the senses in its prey.
Increases the duration of the Undetectable Status Effect by +0.5 seconds.

name: Deer Lung
description:
A raw, rubbery lung that reinvigorates The Demogorgon.
Increases the Traversing speed between Portals by +30 %.
Reduces available Portals by -2 Portals.

name: Lifeguard Whistle
description:
A rusty, metal whistle that once ruled the Hawkins public pool.
Survivors near activated Portals are indicated by Killer Instinct without having to charge Of the Abyss.
Reduces the Killer Instinct's Detection range by -1 metre.
"Emits a strong electromagnetic field: it must have come into contact with the Upside Down." — Hawkins National Laboratory

name: Vermilion Webcap
description:
A bright red poisonous mushroom from the Upside Down.
Increases the duration of the Undetectable Status Effect by +3 seconds.
"Still experimenting with this specimen, so far our results are inconsistent." — Hawkins National Laboratory

name: Upside Down Resin
description:
A sticky, flammable sap that fortifies the gateway to the inter-dimensional tunnels.
Increases the time Survivors require to seal Portals by +40 %.
"A sample taken from the bark of the tree once used as a gate. So far our conclusion as to its effect are inconclusive." — Hawkins National Laboratory

name: Edge of Revival Album
description:
The Trickster's debut album.The coarse and vicious tone was met with a mixed reaction from fans despite critical acclaim.
Blades shatter when hitting the environment, dealing 50 % Laceration to nearby Survivors.
"Your whisper on meWarm as can beBurning each breathTill I can't breathe" — The Trickster's "Whispers of Warmth"

name: Diamond Cufflinks
description:
Cufflinks gouged into the eyes of a sasaeng fan who made the mistake of stalking Ji-Woon.Rubbing off the blood, there is so much to be seen in the glitter.
When a Survivor's Laceration Meter is one Blade Hit away from the maximum, their Aura is revealed for 6 seconds.
"Shhh... you don't have to see your blood anymore." — Ji-Woon Hak

name: Scarlet Egg
description:
A fresh egg, strikingly red in colour, about the size of a quail's egg.
Increases Killer Instinct duration when triggered by Rites of Judgement by +1.5 seconds.
"I've never been so scared in my whole life! You couldn't care less about me... could you?" — Maria

name: Rust-Coloured Egg
description:
An old-looking egg, coloured reddish orange, about the size of a quail's egg.
Survivors affected by Rites of Judgement suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.
"James... you made me happy." — Mary

name: Lost Memories Book
description:
A book about the history and legends of Silent Hill and the surrounding area.
Survivors affected by Rites of Judgement suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 15 seconds.
"They called this place 'The Place of the Silent Spirits'."

name: Lively Crickets
description:
Insects which scarcely avoided being eaten by a mysterious drifter.
Increases Possessed Chain Turn rate by +10 %.

name: Burning Candle
description:
A candle lit by Frank Cotton during a fatal summoning ceremony.
Reduces Chain Hunt Activation time by -3 seconds.

name: Bent Nail
description:
A simple nail that cut deep into Larry Cotton's hand.Though the damage was superficial, it set into motion a horrifying set of events.
Grants 100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Chain Bound Score Event in the Deviousness Category.
Hits with Possessed Chains only spawn 1 additional Chain.

name: Wriggling Maggots
description:
Larvae that poured from the mouth of a corpse hidden in the Cotton household.
Increases Possessed Chains Turn rate by +15 %.

name: Spoiled Meal
description:
A pile of mould, feasted on by a cockroach.Perhaps a sign of Frank Cotton's mysterious disappearance...
Increases maximum Possessed Chains Travel distance by +2 metres.

name: Skewered Rat
description:
A crude solution for the Cotton home's rat problem.
Reduces Summons of Pain cool-down by -0.45 seconds.

name: Liquified Gore
description:
The result of summoning the Cenobites.There is no telling what part of the human body this belonged to.
Increases Lament Configuration Solving time by +1 second.

name: Flickering Television
description:
A television that acted strangely upon the arrival of the Cenobites.
Increases maximum Gateway Casting distance by +4 metres.

name: Marshal's Badge
description:
A silver badge taken from the corpse of a lawman in Arizona Territory who interfered with the Hellshire Gang's bounties.
Reduces the Terror Radius of The Deathslinger by -4 metres while Aiming Down Sights.
"Get your prayers in, you'll be swinging by noon." — Caleb Quinn

name: Jaw Smasher
description:
The bullet that ripped through Caleb's jaw during a frenzy shootout.It brings back burning desire for revenge.
Increases the Movement speed of The Deathslinger while Aiming Down Sights by +1 %.
"You called death to your door the instant you done me wrong." — Caleb Quinn

name: Chewing Tobacco
description:
A can of clipped and sweetened tobacco leaves lifted from a gutted body in Glenvale.Stimulates the nervous system.
Reduces the Stun duration when Survivors break free from The Redeemer by -0.5 seconds.

name: Warden's Keys
description:
The dull jangle of the keys evokes a furious memory within Caleb.
Reduces the Reload time by -0.5 seconds.

name: Wanted Poster
description:
The yellowed remains of a wanted poster for Mason Kelly.It kept Caleb focused on the hunt.
Increases the Movement speed of The Deathslinger while Aiming Down Sights by +2.5 %.
"You'll be met with a fierce reckoning, swear it on my mum's grave." — Caleb Quinn

name: Tin Oil Can
description:
A can holding a small amount of oil to reduce friction in machinery.Early models of the Speargun were notorious for jamming, and oil had to be readily available.
Reduces the Cool-down time after missed shots with The Redeemer by -0.5 seconds.

name: Honey Locust Thorn
description:
Angered with a bounty who fled twice before, Caleb twisted thorn branches onto a spear and let it loose.
Survivors breaking free from The Redeemer suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.

name: Worry Stone
description:
While the Ottomarians were told to think only positive thoughts, some kept these stones in their pockets to rub when negative thoughts arose.
Reveals the Aura of a Survivor for 6 seconds when they lock a Locker.

name: War Helmet
description:
While investigating an Overlap in the Alps, she found an abandoned war bunker.She took a helmet from it after the Overlap nearly took her.
Increases the duration of Killer Instinct by +1.5 seconds during Nightfall.

name: Ottomarian Writing
description:
The words of Otto Stamper were the only words available for his followers to read, decrying malthink and malspeak.
Reduces the Cool-down duration of The Gloaming by -4 seconds during Daytime.

name: Destroyed Pillow
description:
While not allowed to sleep, leaders amongst the Ottomarians tore sleeping supplies to shreds to prevent malthinkers from sneaking off to nap.
Reduces the Cool-down duration of The Gloaming by -2.5 seconds during Nightfall.

name: Broken Doll
description:
Followers brought their families to live in a utopia.None of them were spared.
Increases the duration of Nightfall by 20 seconds.

name: Tilling Blade
description:
The island was self-sufficient, and followers tilled the tough soil to grow crops during the warm season.
Healthy Survivors injured during Nightfall suffer from the Blindness, Haemorrhage, and the Mangled Status Effects for 60 seconds.
"Like a predatory beast, it can smell and track blood."

name: Torture Pillar
description:
A dangling slab covered in the gore of past victims.
Reduces Chain Hunt Activation time by -6 seconds.

name: Slice of Frank
description:
A slab of Frank's face after his torture at the hand of the Cenobites.
Survivors carrying the Lament Configuration suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect.

name: Larry's Remains
description:
The skeletal remains of Larry Cotton, covered in a thick, sticky layer of blood.
Increases Lament Configuration Solving time by +2 seconds.

name: Larry's Blood
description:
The blood of Larry Cotton, which partially resurrected his brother Frank.
Increases maximum Possessed Chains Travel distance by +4 metres.

name: Frank's Heart
description:
The beating heart of Frank, given life from his brother's blood.
Increases maximum Gateway Casting distance by +8 metres.

name: Original Pain
description:
The first pin pushed into Pinhead's skull.Such pleasure and pain.
Survivors who break free of Possessed Chains suffer from the Deep Wound Status Effect

name: Bayshore's Gold Tooth
description:
A golden tooth torn from Henry Bayshore as he screamed for mercy, hours before he was finished off.
Increases the Reeling speed by +9 %.
"Know your place, boy. Know you damn place." — Henry Bayshore

name: Prison Chain
description:
A thick, heavy chain that once held a steel ball and latched to Caleb's ankle.It has been re-purposed to hook onto a spear.
Increases the time required for Survivors to break free from The Redeemer by +10 %.
"Inmates working beyond the prison yard must be affixed with a steel ball of no less than 18 pounds." — Hellshire Penitentiary Guard Book

name: Gold Creek Whiskey
description:
Warm comfort in a bottle that quelled Caleb's anger and slowed his step.
Reduces the Terror Radius of The Deathslinger by -8 metres while Aiming Down Sights.
"A smooth taste for the rugged frontier." — Gold Creek Advertisement, 1876

name: Bayshore's Cigar
description:
A quality cigar, plucked from the jacket of Caleb's boss while he wailed over the spear lodged in his abdomen.
Reduces the Stun duration when Survivors break free from The Redeemer by -1 second.
"Do not point that thing at me, you slack-jawed imbecile." — Henry Bayshore

name: Lavalier Microphone
description:
She kept a lavalier mic nearby, allowing her to record her innermost feelings when under great stress.
Consuming the last Power Token will reveal the Auras of all Survivors for 3 seconds.
Entering a Locker through teleportation causes all Lockers within 6 metres of any Survivor to open and slam their doors.

name: Field Recorder
description:
Haddie documented all of her forays near Overlaps, to prove not only to the world but herself what she saw and felt.
Nightfall is active at the start of the Trial.
Nightfall activates automatically when the final Generator is completed.
Any Survivor coming into contact with the Remnant suffers from the Exhausted Status Effect for 15 seconds.

name: Impaling Wire
description:
A wire that pierces the cheeks of a Cenobite, while revealing the gaping wound on her neck.
Summons 1 additional Chain if a Survivor uses the environment to break a Chain.

name: Greasy Black Lens
description:
A lens from the sunglasses of an obese Cenobite whose fleshy rolls droop down his face and neck.
Reveals Survivors hit by Possessed Chains for 6 seconds
